targets.query:
from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status_node")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "deg_C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "download_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "download"}))
  |> yield(name: "download")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "upload_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "upload"}))
  |> yield(name: "upload")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "chain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "last_block")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status_exec")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> yield(name: "active_percent")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status_consensus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> yield(name: "active_percent")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "chain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "last_block")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> yield(name: "last_block")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value, _time: r._time, _field: "cpu_usage" }))
  |> yield(name: "cpu_usage")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "deg_C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value, _time: r._time, _field: "temp" }))
  |> yield(name: "temp")

from(bucket: "ethonrpi")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "chain")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sync_part_perc_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^${single_dev}$/)
  |> yield(name: "sync_part_perc_0")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "ethonrpi",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "status_node",
  start: -30d
)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._value =~ /^.*_s$/)
list.label: Single device nodes
list.name: single_dev
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "ethonrpi",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "status_node",

|> filter(fn: (r) => r._value =~ /^.*_s$/)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "ethonrpi",
  tag: "host",
  predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "status_node",
  start: -30d
)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._value =~ /^.*_d$/)
list.description: Ethereum node based on two devices
list.label: Dual device nodes
list.name: dual_dev
